snippet: In my neighborhood, our children are not safe.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Rula Salameh, Palestinian journalist and resident of Jerusalem, describes how kidnapping and murder of Palestinian teen Muhammad Abu Khdeir by Jewish extremists makes her worry for her own son; says fear that no parent should experience is pervasive among all mothers in East Jerusalem and says world should hold Israeli government accountable for actions that have set context for much of violence in region.
lead_paragraph: In my neighborhood, our children are not safe.

headline.main: A Palestinian Mother’s Fear in East Jerusalem
headline.print_headline: A Mother’s Fear in East Jerusalem
